content: these patterns are free on my youtube channel however if you prefer the ad-free downloadable pdf version that can be purchased on my website https //www amenagerieofstitches com/products/14-days-of-mini-valentine-amigurumi-mystery-crochet-a-long-crochet-pdf-pattern it s time for the 14 days of mini valentine amigurumi mystery crochet-a-long i m a big fan of crocheting things for valentine s day and i m an even bigger fan of crocheting mini amigurumi i m combining the two and bringing you an extra sweet crochet-a-long you won t want to miss each day from february 1st to february 14th i ll be releasing a new mini amigurumi these will be free video tutorials that you can watch over on my youtube channel each mini takes only about an hour to complete which makes these the perfect project to work on if you need a last minute gift these patterns are great for all skill levels so even if you re a beginner you can make these crochet pattern difficulty beginner to intermediate pattern is written in english with us crochet terminology materials needed weight 1 or super fine weight yarn i m using hobbii rainbow cotton 8/4 in the colors light grey 16 natural white 002 a scrap piece of pink for the cheeks i used friends cotton 8/4 in the color rose 44 size b/2 25mm crochet hook 6mm safety eyes black embroidery floss and needle polyester fiberfill stuffing yarn needle scissors stitch marker skills needed magic_ring single_crochet increase invisible decrease chain working in back bumps of a chain finished measurement chocolate kiss measures 1 25 inches wide by 1 5 inches tall please note- the finished size will vary depending on what type of yarn and size hook you decide to use as well as how you decide to finish it
